00025 #include "OgreStringConverter.h"
00026 #include "OgreVector3.h"
00027 #include "OgreMatrix3.h"
00028 #include "OgreMatrix4.h"
00029 #include "OgreQuaternion.h"

00031 
00032 #include <sstream>
00033 
00034 namespace Ogre {
00035 
00036     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00037     String StringConverter::toString(Real val)
00038     {
00039         std::stringstream stream;
00040         stream << val;
00041         return stream.str();
00042     }
00043     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00044     String StringConverter::toString(int val)
00045     {
00046         std::stringstream stream;
00047         stream << val;
00048         return stream.str();
00049     }
00050     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00051     String StringConverter::toString(unsigned int val)
00052     {
00053         std::stringstream stream;
00054         stream << val;
00055         return stream.str();
00056     }
00057     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00058     String StringConverter::toString(long val)
00059     {
00060         std::stringstream stream;
00061         stream << val;
00062         return stream.str();
00063     }
00064     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00065     String StringConverter::toString(unsigned long val)
00066     {
00067         std::stringstream stream;
00068         stream << val;
00069         return stream.str();
00070     }
00071     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00072     String StringConverter::toString(const Vector3& val)
00073     {
00074         std::stringstream stream;
00075         stream << val.x << " " << val.y << " " << val.z;
00076         return stream.str();
00077     }
00078     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00079     String StringConverter::toString(const Matrix3& val)
00080     {
00081         std::stringstream stream;
00082         stream << val[0][0] << " " 
00083             << val[0][1] << " "             
00084             << val[0][2] << " "             
00085             << val[1][0] << " "             
00086             << val[1][1] << " "             
00087             << val[1][2] << " "             
00088             << val[2][0] << " "             
00089             << val[2][1] << " "             
00090             << val[2][2];
00091         return stream.str();
00092     }
00093     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00094     String StringConverter::toString(bool val)
00095     {
00096         if (val)
00097             return "true";
00098         else
00099             return "false";
00100 
00101     }
00102     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00103     String StringConverter::toString(const Matrix4& val)
00104     {
00105         std::stringstream stream;
00106         stream << val[0][0] << " " 
00107             << val[0][1] << " "             
00108             << val[0][2] << " "             
00109             << val[0][3] << " "             
00110             << val[1][0] << " "             
00111             << val[1][1] << " "             
00112             << val[1][2] << " "             
00113             << val[1][3] << " "             
00114             << val[2][0] << " "             
00115             << val[2][1] << " "             
00116             << val[2][2] << " "             
00117             << val[2][3] << " "             
00118             << val[3][0] << " "             
00119             << val[3][1] << " "             
00120             << val[3][2] << " "             
00121             << val[3][3];
00122         return stream.str();
00123     }
00124     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00125     String StringConverter::toString(const Quaternion& val)
00126     {
00127         std::stringstream stream;
00128         stream << val.x << " " << val.y << " " << val.z << " " << val.w;
00129         return stream.str();
00130     }
00131     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00132     String StringConverter::toString(const ColourValue& val)
00133     {
00134         std::stringstream stream;
00135         stream << val.r << " " << val.g << " " << val.b << " " << val.a;
00136         return stream.str();
00137     }
00138     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00139     Real StringConverter::parseReal(const String& val)
00140     {
00141         return atof(val.c_str());
00142     }
00143     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00144     int StringConverter::parseInt(const String& val)
00145     {
00146         return atoi(val.c_str());
00147     }
00148     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00149     unsigned int StringConverter::parseUnsignedInt(const String& val)
00150     {
00151         return atoi(val.c_str());
00152     }
00153     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00154     long StringConverter::parseLong(const String& val)
00155     {
00156         return atol(val.c_str());
00157     }
00158     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00159     unsigned long StringConverter::parseUnsignedLong(const String& val)
00160     {
00161         return atol(val.c_str());
00162     }
00163     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00164     bool StringConverter::parseBool(const String& val)
00165     {
00166         if (val == "true")
00167             return true;
00168         else
00169             return false;
00170     }
00171     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00172     Vector3 StringConverter::parseVector3(const String& val)
00173     {
00174         // Split on space
00175         std::vector<String> vec = val.split();
00176 
00177         if (vec.size() != 3)
00178         {
00179             return Vector3::ZERO;
00180         }
00181         else
00182         {
00183             return Vector3(parseReal(vec[0]),parseReal(vec[1]),parseReal(vec[2]));
00184         }
00185 
00186     }
00187     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00188     Matrix3 StringConverter::parseMatrix3(const String& val)
00189     {
00190         // Split on space
00191         std::vector<String> vec = val.split();
00192 
00193         if (vec.size() != 9)
00194         {
00195             return Matrix3::IDENTITY;
00196         }
00197         else
00198         {
00199             return Matrix3(parseReal(vec[0]),parseReal(vec[1]),parseReal(vec[2]),
00200                 parseReal(vec[3]),parseReal(vec[4]),parseReal(vec[5]),
00201                 parseReal(vec[6]),parseReal(vec[7]),parseReal(vec[8]));
00202         }
00203     }
00204     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00205     Matrix4 StringConverter::parseMatrix4(const String& val)
00206     {
00207         // Split on space
00208         std::vector<String> vec = val.split();
00209 
00210         if (vec.size() != 16)
00211         {
00212             return Matrix4::IDENTITY;
00213         }
00214         else
00215         {
00216             return Matrix4(parseReal(vec[0]),parseReal(vec[1]),parseReal(vec[2]), parseReal(vec[3]),
00217                 parseReal(vec[4]),parseReal(vec[5]), parseReal(vec[6]), parseReal(vec[7]),
00218                 parseReal(vec[8]),parseReal(vec[9]), parseReal(vec[10]), parseReal(vec[11]),
00219                 parseReal(vec[12]),parseReal(vec[13]), parseReal(vec[14]), parseReal(vec[15]));
00220         }
00221     }
00222     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00223     Quaternion StringConverter::parseQuaternion(const String& val)
00224     {
00225         // Split on space
00226         std::vector<String> vec = val.split();
00227 
00228         if (vec.size() != 4)
00229         {
00230             return Quaternion::IDENTITY;
00231         }
00232         else
00233         {
00234             return Quaternion(parseReal(vec[0]),parseReal(vec[1]),parseReal(vec[2]), parseReal(vec[3]));
00235         }
00236     }
00237     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00238     ColourValue StringConverter::parseColourValue(const String& val)
00239     {
00240         // Split on space
00241         std::vector<String> vec = val.split();
00242 
00243         if (vec.size() == 4)
00244         {
00245             return ColourValue(parseReal(vec[0]),parseReal(vec[1]),parseReal(vec[2]), parseReal(vec[3]));
00246         }
00247         else if (vec.size() == 3)
00248         {
00249             return ColourValue(parseReal(vec[0]),parseReal(vec[1]),parseReal(vec[2]), 1.0f);
00250         }
00251         else
00252         {
00253             return ColourValue::Black;
00254         }
00255     }
00256 }
